Verses: 1 aadhiyile Dhevan Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Sirushtiththaar.
2 boomiyaanadhu Ozhunginmaiyum Verumaiyumaai Irundhadhu; Aazhaththinmel Irul Irundhadhu; Dheva Aaviyaanavar Jalaththinmel Asaivaadikkondirundhaar.
3 dhevan Velichcham Undaagakkadavadhu Endraar, Velichcham Undaayitru.
4 velichcham Nalladhu Endru Dhevan Kandaar; Velichchaththaiyum Irulaiyum Dhevan Vevveraagap Piriththaar.
5 dhevan Velichchaththukkup Pagal Endru Perittaar, Irulukku Iravu Endru Perittaar; Saayangaalamum Vidiyarkaalamumaagi Mudhalaam Naal Aayitru.
6 pinbu Dhevan: Jalaththin Maththiyil Aagaayavirivu Undaagakkadavadhu Endrum, Adhu Jalaththinindru Jalaththaip Pirikkakkadavadhu Endrum Sonnaar.
7 dhevan Aagaayavirivai Undupanni, Aagaayavirivukkuk Keezhe Irukkira Jalaththirkum Aagaayavirivukku Mele Irukkira Jalaththirkum Pirivundaakkinaar; Adhu Appadiye Aayitru.
8 dhevan Aagaayavirivukku Vaanam Endru Perittaar; Saayangaalamum Vidiyarkaalamumaagi Irandaam Naal Aayitru.
9 pinbu Dhevan: Vaanaththin Keezhe Irukkira Jalam Oridaththil Seravum, Vettaandharai Kaanappadavum Kadavadhu Endraar; Adhu Appadiye Aayitru.
10 dhevan Vettaandharaikku Boomi Endrum, Serndha Jalaththirku Samuththiram Endrum Perittaar; Dhevan Adhu Nalladhu Endru Kandaar.

11 appozhudhu Dhevan: Boomiyaanadhu Pullaiyum, Vidhaiyaip Pirappikkum Poondugalaiyum, Boomiyinmel Thangalil Thangal Vidhaiyaiyudaiya Kanigalaith Thangal Thangal Jaadhiyinpadiye Kodukkum Kanivirutchangalaiyum Mulaippikkakkadavadhu Endraar; Adhu Appadiye Aayitru.

12 boomiyaanadhu Pullaiyum, Thangal Thangal Jaadhiyinpadiye Vidhaiyaip Pirappikkum Poondugalaiyum Thangal Thangal Jaadhiyinpadiye Thangalil Thangal Vidhaiyaiyudaiya Kanigalaik Kodukkum Virutchangalaiyum Mulaippiththadhu; Dhevan Adhu Nalladhu Endru Kandaar.
13 saayangaalamum Vidiyarkaalamumaagi Moondraam Naal Aayitru.

14 pinbu Dhevan: Pagalukkum Iravukkum Viththiyaasam Undaagaththakkadhaaga Vaanam Engira Aagaayavirivile Sudargal Undaagakkadavadhu, Avaigal Adaiyaalangalukkaagavum Kaalangalaiyum Naatkalaiyum Varushangalaiyum Kurikkiradharkaagavum Irukkakkadavadhu Endraar.
15 avaigal Boomiyinmel Pragaasikkumpadikku Vaanam Engira Aagaayavirivile Sudargalaayirukkakkadavadhu Endraar; Adhu Appadiye Aayitru.
16 dhevan, Pagalai Aalap Periya Sudarum, Iravai Aala Siriya Sudarum Aagiya Irandu Magaththaana Sudargalaiyum, Natchaththirangalaiyum Undaakkinaar.
17 avaigal Boomiyinmel Pragaasikkavum,
18 pagalaiyum Iravaiyum Aalavum, Velichchaththukkum Irulukkum Viththiyaasam Undaakkavum, Dhevan Avaigalai Vaanam Engira Aagaayavirivile Vaiththaar; Dhevan Adhu Nalladhu Endru Kandaar.
19 saayangaalamum Vidiyarkaalamumaagi Naalaam Naal Aayitru.
20 pinbu Dhevan: Neendhum Jeevajandhukkalaiyum, Boomiyinmel Vaanam Engira Aagaayavirivile Parakkum Paravaigalaiyum, Jalamaanadhu Thiralaai Janippikkakkadavadhu Endraar.

21 dhevan, Magaa Machchangalaiyum, Jalaththil Thangal Thangal Jaadhiyinpadiye Thiralaai Janippikkappatta Sagalavidha Neer Vaazhum Jandhukkalaiyum, Siragulla Jaadhijaadhiyaana Sagalavidhap Patchigalaiyum Sirushtiththaar; Dhevan Adhu Nalladhu Endru Kandaar.
22 dhevan Avaigalai Aaseervadhiththu, Neengal Palugip Perugi, Samuththira Jalaththai Nirappungal Endrum, Paravaigal Boomiyil Perugakkadavadhu Endrum Sonnaar.
23 saayangaalamum Vidiyarkaalamumaagi Aindhaam Naal Aayitru.

24 pinbu Dhevan: Boomiyaanadhu Jaadhijaadhiyaana Jeevajandhukkalaagiya Naattumirugangalaiyum, Oorum Praanigalaiyum, Kaattumirugangalaiyum Jaadhijaadhiyaagap Pirappikkakkadavadhu Endraar; Adhu Appadiye Aayitru.
25 dhevan Boomiyilulla Jaadhijaadhiyaana Kaattumirugangalaiyum, Jaadhijaadhiyaana Naattumirugangalaiyum, Boomiyil Oorum Praanigal Ellaavatraiyum Undaakkinaar; Dhevan Adhu Nalladhu Endru Kandaar.

26 pinbu Dhevan: Namadhu Saayalaagavum Namadhu Roobaththinpadiyeyum Manushanai Undaakkuvomaaga; Avargal Samuththiraththin Machchangalaiyum, Aagaayaththup Paravaigalaiyum, Mirugajeevankalaiyum, Boomiyanaiththaiyum, Boomiyinmel Oorum Sagalap Praanigalaiyum Aalakkadavargal Endraar.
27 dhevan Thammudaiya Saayalaaga Manushanai Sirushtiththaar, Avanaith Dhevasaayalaagave Sirushtiththaar; Aanum Pennumaaga Avargalai Sirushtiththaar.

28 pinbu Dhevan Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Palugip Perugi, Boomiyai Nirappi, Adhaik Keezhppaduththi, Samuththiraththin Machchangalaiyum Aagaayaththup Paravaigalaiyum, Boomiyinmel Nadamaadugira Sagala Jeevajandhukkalaiyum Aandukollungal Endru Solli, Dhevan Avargalai Aaseervadhiththaar.

29 pinnum Dhevan: Idho, Boomiyinmel Engum Vidhaitharum Sagalavidhap Poondugalaiyum, Vidhaitharum Kanimarangalaagiya Sagalavidha Virutchangalaiyum Ungalukkuk Koduththen, Avaigal Ungalukku Aagaaramaayirukkakkadavadhu;

30 boomiyilulla Sagala Mirugajeevangalukkum, Aagaayaththilulla Sagala Paravaigalukkum, Boomiyinmel Oorum Praanigal Ellaavatrirkum Pasumaiyaana Sagala Poondugalaiyum Aagaaramaagak Koduththen Endraar; Adhu Appadiye Aayitru.
31 appozhudhu Dhevan Thaam Undaakkina Ellaavatraiyum Paarththaar, Adhu Migavum Nandraayirundhadhu; Saayangaalamum Vidiyarkaalamumaagi Aaraam Naal Aayitru.
